definition: to wear/to put on/to dress/to bore through/to pierce/to perforate/to penetrate/to pass through/to thread

(main) hall/large room for a specific purpose/CL:間|间[jian1]/relationship between cousins etc on the paternal side of a family/of the same clan/classifier for classes, lectures etc/classifier for sets of furniture

sentences.english: Block draughts around doors and windows.
When the book open , one hole goes to two holes , it has a lot of wind.
sentences.chinese: 書一打開，一個洞變成了兩個洞，有很大的穿堂風。

sentences.english: The room is terribly drafty with the window open.
sentences.chinese: 窗戶開着，房間裏的穿堂風大得嚇人。
